original_text: And there were more chief men found of the sons of Eleazar than of the sons of Ithamar, and thus were they divided. Among the sons of Eleazar there were sixteen chief men of the house of their fathers, and eight among the sons of Ithamar according to the house of their fathers.
korean_text: 엘르아살의 자손 중에 우두머리가 이다말의 자손보다 많으므로 나눈 것이 이러하니 엘르아살 자손의 우두머리가 열여섯 명이요 이다말 자손은 그 조상들의 가문을 따라 여덟 명이라

sentences.original_text: And there were more chief men found
than of the sons of Ithamar,
of the house of their fathers,
and eight among the sons of Ithamar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이다말의 아들들 중에는 여덟 명이

sentences.original_text: according to the house of their fathers.
